Package com.oopsipushedtomain

Class ProfileActivityIntentTest

java.lang.Object
com.oopsipushedtomain.ProfileActivityIntentTest
public class ProfileActivityIntentTest extends Object
Intent test for the ProfileActivity. Covers the following user stories: US 02.02.01 - Upload profile picture US 02.02.02 - Option to remove profile pictures US 02.02.03 - Update personal profile information (name) US 02.05.01 - Automatic profile picture generation US 02.06.01 - No login requirement for app access
See Also:
  • ProfileActivity

    • typeTextInDialog

      public void typeTextInDialog(String textToType, int numBackspaces) throws InterruptedException
      Helper function to type text into a dialog EditText that is already visible and press save.
      Parameters:
      textToType - Text string that will be typed into the EditText.
      numBackspaces - Number of times to hit backspace before typing. Used for birthday since its default value is "Bye".
      Throws:
      InterruptedException - For Thread.sleep() and typeTextInDialog()

    • cleanUp

      public void cleanUp()
      Clean up the database by deleting the test user, test event, and test announcement.
